name: van der Laan Consulting
goal: van der Laan Consulting provides strategic advisory services on international regulatory and policy issues.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Consumer Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Food Safety, Trade
euInitiatives: Prioritization of substances under REACH, cosmetics ingredients regulation, climate change policies, approval of biotech events, review of approval procedures for biotech events, the regulation of plant breeding innovation, the revision of the Renewable Energy Directive, sustainability of the food chain, pesticides and MRLs, reform of comitology.
